entry.string: File size exceeds the maximum allowable based on the server's settings.
entry.translation: Feele-a seeze-a ixceeds zee mexeemoom ellooeble-a besed oon zee serfer's setteengs. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: File size exceeds the maximum allowable defined by the website administrator.
entry.translation: Feele-a seeze-a ixceeds zee mexeemoom ellooeble-a deffeened by zee vebseete-a edmeenistretur. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!
